description:
Beyond Time is the fourth chapter of the enthralling Sarah Pennington saga, which follows Sarah's exploits as a member of the Secret Order of the Griffin and the Order's fight against the sinister Dragon Clan.
Delve into the fourth chapter of the enthralling saga of Sarah Pennington and her fight against the sinister Dragon Clan.

name: Tavernier
description: Tavernier is a mix between a tavern-management game and an interactive fiction. You'll play as a barkeeper managing his tavern, coping with events, good and bad alike, in a (not so peaceful) town. A town that keeps a dark secret...

name: VR Amazing Files: Horror Hospital
description:
Your task is to investigate an abandoned hospital and find the missing research notes. The note may help us find the No. 0 patient, who is the key person of making serum. 
Good luck,investigator !

name: SteamHammerVR
description: Your adventure takes place in Victorian London 1892. The dastardly Professor Rattwurm is attempting to enslave the fine English folk with his multitude of clockwork automatons! Armed with your steam powered weapons, can you save old London Town?

name: King of Booze: Drinking Game
description:
King of Booze is a party game involving a wide variety of challenges, drinking, and choosing between the two. 
Whether you drink or dare, or hug, or kiss, or dance, or get naked, or slap your friend, or call your ex.. or your mom. You will have a fantastic "did that just happen" time.

name: VHSoverdose
description: VHSoverdose is an unrelenting assault of outlandish action, served up with thick juicy slice of anatomical annihilation! Set inside of the confides of a simple 80's Arcade Machine... Or is it?

name: The Enlightened League of Bone Builders and the Osseous Enigma Content
description: Reckon yourself to be a most esteemed anatomist, do you? Well then immerse yourself in an intriguing Victorian parlour of curios to see how quickly you can piece together Yorick's complete skeleton. There are lots of other things to explore too, so stop your lollygagging and see if you've got the right stuff to join the Enlightened League of Bone Builders. The timer has started!

name: Gooblins
description: Save yourself from waves of Gooblins! Though appearing cute and cuddly, these creatures are determined to scatter your remains into space with plasma, fireballs, or kamikaze attacks. Survive the onslaught while killing Gooblins in color combos to rack up points and climb the leaderboard!

name: Drop Out 0
description:
Drop Out 0 is an online first person shooter with a twist: there are no hitpoints! Beat your opponents by knocking them out of the map with various crazy weapons. 
 
The game features very straightforward, cross-platform multiplayer. Just download, set up and play online within 2 minutes. The game additionally features a single player practice mode.

name: Cowbots and Aliens
description: A furious PvP Multiplayer brawl in VR set in the Saloon-iverse of Cowbots and Aliens. Free movement, deadly gunplay, multiple competitive modes and a custom networked physics system that lets you use EVERYTHING as a weapon makes for an immensely satisfying VR ruckus! Includes intensely fun single player AI to play against as well.

name: A Dead World's Dream
description:
A Dead World's Dream is a challenging retro platformer
As a peaceful alien, explore a harsh world looking for hidden species.
Unlocking upgrades and power-ups, travel to even more treacherous places.
Carefuly examine your surroundings before jumping toward new dangers and secrets.
Will you overcome all threats and give your friends a chance to live on?

name: Custom Town
description:
A Town Building Game that lets you design most elements from the ground up. 
Create your own addresses and houses and customize your own residents. 
Watch your intelligent and autonomious residents on their own daily schedule that you have planned.

name: Redout: Enhanced Edition
description: Redout is a tribute to the old racing monsters such as F-Zero, WipeOut, Rollcage, and POD. It is designed to be an uncompromising, fast, tough and satisfying driving experience, soaked in that vertigo that stands at the core of the arcade racing genre.

name: Caketomino
description: A puzzle game about cakes. Build all 30 cake Pentomino (and other Polyomino) puzzles! Can you solve them all?

name: Fly to Kuma Maker
description:
"New stages are packed with contraptions to block the Kuma's progress!
Solve the puzzles to get the Kuma to their destination!
Try your hand at designing your own stages with Maker Mode!
Make your own original stages and share them for players world wide to try!

name: Sisyphus Reborn
description:
Sisyphus Reborn is a short atmospheric existential adventure game. Light on puzzles and heavy on atmosphere, the game focuses on exploring philosophical ideas in a short form context.

You wake up in a world where everyone digs forever and no one dies. You will never know why or how you came to be there, but now that you are...

How do you find meaning in a meaningless world?

name: The Odyssey
description: Step into this epic point-and-click mythical adventure game. See what it takes to be the Greek hero Odysseus (Ulysses)! Get ready to embark on a journey filled with danger, mythical creatures and ancient Gods. Thrilling moments and unexpected twists as well as the evil presence of legendary creatures dominate this mythical game throughout.

name: CyberThreat
description: Explore the streets, buildings, and rooftops of a 14 block urban warzone with no limitations. Locomotion options include teleportation, touchpad sliding, arm running, jumping, climbing, and even flying.

name: Guardian war VR
description: This is a VR game with HTC VIVE. In the sword and magic of the world incarnate the chosen warriors, do everything to prevent the evil attack! The future of the world is in your hands!

name: A Large Quantity of Mushrooms
description:
ALQOM: A Large Quantity Of Mushrooms is an interactive experience for virtual reality, combining elements of adventure, exploration and horror genres.

You find yourself in a dark, surreal world full of mysteries and inhabited by strange creatures. Explore and interact with the environment to discover the nature of this strange new reality, learn the story of its inhabitants and get immersed in the world of horror and beauty, of reality and fantasy, despair and hope.

- exploration/horror game
- dark, surreal world
- interact with the environment, solve riddles, discover secrets
- slow-paced seated experience with classic first person view
- exclusively for Virtual Reality

name: Preston Sterling
description: Preston Sterling and the Legend of Excalibur is the first episode of an adventure series that will transport you into the world of English myths and legends. Tackle tricky puzzles and enjoy an exciting story, lovable characters and stunning scenes and locations!

name: Flying Baron 1916
description:
Head to head fight your enemies in awesome 3D air-battles, experience the highly detailed 
surroundings of the battlegrounds, complete dicey missions and dig into the action of 
WW 1 air fights.

name: Zombie Boom
description: Another blasting opportunity for you! Only this time with a whole bunch of zombies... Take the chance to clear 60 levels full of brain-eating zeds and save your friends' body parts. Get ready for a big ZOMBIE BOOM.

name: Elves vs Goblins Defender
description: Lead elfish warriors into battle against hordes of goblins, golems and ghosts.

name: Fat Mask
description: Fat Mask is an arcade puzzle brawler that creates a frenetic experience thanks to a unique mix of brawler and puzzle mechanics. Steal your friends' hard earned combos in the free-for-all mode or contest the world high-scores in the stressful solo/coop mode of this quirky action-packed game!

name: The Garden
description: The Garden is a retro-style action role-playing game about young John Marshall on and epic quest to find his family.  You'll meet both friends and enemies, aquire powerful new weapons and abilities, as you fight your way thourgh this story-driven adventure!

name: Grapply
description: Grapply is a racing game where players use grapple beams to pull themselves around tracks and through the air racing against the AI.

name: The Tale of Doris and the Dragon - Episode 1
description: The Tale of Doris and the Dragon is an episodic, point-and-click adventure game series featuring an elderly lady named Doris who finds herself in Purgatory after passing away on earth.

name: Isomorph
description: Isomorph is an atmospheric 3D puzzle-platformer. Solve dozens of challenging puzzles by changing the direction of gravity and manipulating physics, while being immersed in a calming ambient environment.

name: Oniris Basket VR
description: Immerse yourself in Oniris Basket VR, a game created for HTC Vive in which you can become a professional All Star player and participate in the famous three point contest. Enjoy playing basketball in the different surrealistic scenarios and game modes. Have fun, train and compete to improve day by day.

name: Veilia
description: Veilia is an exploration adventure game, which focuses on the story of Veilia, a cursed girl who has been separated from her body. It is now your job to help her in her search for her old body as well as the sorcerer that took it from her.

name: MineSweeper VR
description: The famous "Minesweeper" is now in virtual reality! Classic gameplay with stunning control and excellent atmosphere!

name: Stars Simulation
description: Virtual Reality throwing simulator! Throwing stars, throwing knives, and throwing up depending on your sensitivity to motion sickness! Very early alpha with little to no content! Act now and I guarantee an almost immediate sense of disappointment & regret!

name: Sakura Shrine Girls
description: Two cat girls appear before Toru, a skeptical priest in training. One of them carries herself with dignity and grace, while the other lives her days without a single care. With them, Toru slowly realises that there is more to this world than there seems.

name: Aztecalypse
description:
Action adventure with an apocalyptic touch. 
In Aztecalypse you explore a newly discovered area with remnants of an ancient culture. If you like First Person Action games set in mystic places, in an Open World with neat places to visit aside the story, you will definitely love this game!

name: Virtual Warfighter
description: Virtual Warfighter is a tactical multiplayer shooter for the OpenVR virtual reality platform. Engage in realistic combat with physics-based weapons and handling!

name: Day of the Trumplings
description:
Nobody knew where they came from…. nobody knew what they wanted… until it was too late! Trumplings! Frothing little vessels of rage have come to town, to knock down our Big Beautiful Walls and move their master into the Whitehouse!  
 
Use Gun Control to save America! Build Gun Towers stop the Trumplings before they clear a path to Armageddon! Take 3rd person control and gun down Trumplings in the streets as fast as you can fire, then smite their master with the mighty Fist of Truth!  
 
Violence is not AN answer, it’s THE answer! Take back your country NOW!

name: Funk Unplugged
description: Funk Unplugged is a 3D Platformer where you can use your musical powers and platforming abilities to save the world!

name: Cards of Chaos
description: Cards Of Chaos is a fun packed game for everyone. Outsmart your opponents by playing the right cards at the right time. Fill up the minigame pile together to start minigames where you can eliminate your opponents for card and gold rewards!

name: Soundboxing
description: Soundboxing is a VR music video kickboxing game where you create the beats! You can either punch to the music and compete to beat the best, or record your own challenge for others to beat—all set to your favorite music in a cool outdoor environment.

name: Polycrusher
description: Put your crayons aside and grab some friends, here comes Polycrusher: The local-multiplayer-twin-stick-shooter for ultimate couch gaming. Survive angry mobs of lunatic creatures and ascend into the poly-olympus! The space-time-mango awaits you!

name: Straimium Immortaly
description: Straimium Immortaly is a shmup roguelike dungeoncrawler. Explore the butts-hard procedurally generated Cubicus battling beasties, looting endless item and weapon upgrades and defeating huge boss meanies in your vengeful quest to eradicate the Queeni Emperess.

name: Warriors of Vilvatikta
description: Warriors of Vilvatikta is an epic RPG inspired by real Indonesian history.

name: Snowday
description: Engage in multiplayer VR snowfights that capture real snow play like no FPS (First Person Snowbrawler) you've played before! Throw, dodge, and sneak your way to domination of the neighborhood snowfield.

name: Radical Heroes: Crimson City Crisis
description:
Radical Heroes is a brand new take on the tried and true beat'em up formula.
The story of Radical Heroes: Crimson City Crisis begins with Diesel, an average dude who wakes up to find the city he loves under attack by a mysterious evil force. Determined to defend everything he holds dear, Diesel must face his destiny, overcome the darkest of foes, and embark on a Radical quest to stop the evil from fully engulfing Crimson City before it's too late!

name: Kill
description: Sin descripción

name: Hooligan Vasja
description:
Hooligan Vasja that is a colorful and entertaining time killer. 
 
Your goal is to reach the roof, fighting with different opponents. There is a powerful boss just under the roof. Be careful, the obstacles are extremely dangerous but you can knock them down. The first level is easy but the following ones are progressively more difficult. The opponents become faster and meaner. Your weapon is a sturdy slingshot and firecrackers. Protect your friends who are helping you.

name: The Horus Heresy: Battle of Tallarn
description: The Horus Heresy: Battle of Tallarn is a turn-based strategy game that recreates one of the most important events in Imperial history. Command a vast array of tanks, Dreadnoughts, Knights and Titans across the toxic landscape.

name: Orake 2D MMORPG
description:
Orake is a new 2D MMORPG, 
In Orake you can party up with your friends or make a clan. You can play capture the flag, engage in clan fights, boss fights, explore caves, and much more!

name: Omega Reaction
description: Fend off wave after wave of enemies as you fight to victory in this twin stick shooter.  Fast shooting guns, plus your ship's additional powerful capabilities help you fight through progressively more difficult levels, in order to escape and make your way home.

name: Chaos of Hearts
description: Chaos of Hearts is an action MOBA with elements of RTS and RPG set in a unique virtual world.

name: Relativity
description: Relativity will turn your world upside down. Curved surfaces and stairs allow you to walk from the floor, up the walls and across ceilings, shifting gravity and giving you a whole new perspective! Landscape platforms can be moved and rotated using buttons and wheels to transform the landscape and form bridges. If that isn't challenge enough, there are dragons, jumping crabs, killer robots, laser beams and devious puzzles to contend with.

name: Gerty: Robots In Love
description: The procedurally generated adventure in time and space of a robot, looking for love, and trying to stop the evil GateKeepers from erasing its homeworld from history!

name: Football Blitz
description: Football Blitz is an action packed, vibrant soccer game. You can choose from several different game modes, so everyone will find his favorite one. Play a single player mode or get even more fun gaming with your friend in 2 players mode.

name: Glory by Example
description: A story driven, visual novel inspired, narrative experience chronicling the mysteries of an artificial island city and the tragedy of its few remaining survivors following the downfall of mankind by a world-wide virus outbreak and subsequent global flood. *Based on the released novel!

name: 50 Years
description: 50 Years is a fast-paced alternative to the bigger, longer turn-based strategy games. You can win or lose a game in a single evening.

name: Crappy Zombie Game
description:
Dismember Zombies
- Manual Reloading System
- Dual Wielding
- Axe Throwing Zombies
- Pistol Zombies
- Full Left-handed Support

name: Pinkman
description: Pinkman is a fast-paced, action platformer about a lost man with pink skin and an incredible skill to fart.

name: Zissi's Island
description: Zissi's Island is an open-world 3D platformer set on a tropical island with emphasis on exploration.

name: Juno's Darkest Hour
description: Juno’s Darkest Hour is a simple but challenging 2D action adventure platformer game inspired by the side-scrollers of the past. Explore the secrets of a vast monochromatic world. Will you succeed against all odds, or will you die over and over again?

name: Everything is Peachy
description: Control a colony of peaceful, peach fueled robots in a fast-paced roguish resource gathering game, explore the galaxy as you choose your route to the center to face the ultimate showdown, and hopefully… everything will be peachy.

name: Insane Robots
description: A unique card battler with randomly generated survival arenas and a brave tale of robot rebellion. Can you defeat The Kernel and save robotkind? Play a deep single-player campaign or compete in intense local and online multiplayer!

name: Board Defenders
description: Board Defenders is super-structuring the rules of the world’s most played game of all times - chess. A modern vision thrilling and fun fast action game, combining the pace of an arcade with the challenge of a logic puzzle - brain game, based on chess rules.

name: Nightmare Adventures: The Witch's Prison
description: Help Kiera Vale discover her ancestor’s history!

name: Spirits of Mystery: Amber Maiden - Collector's Edition
description: Undo the amber curse!

name: Grave Mania: Pandemic Pandemonium
description: The Locas are back!

name: Best in Show Solitaire
description: Best in Show Dog Solitaire is a casual solitaire card game that is easy to pick up and play. This incredibly addicting card game features over 40 different breeds of dogs. Each breed has their own unique abilities and stats that affect each hand.

name: Eldritch Hunter
description: Purge a horrific lovecraftian cult from your city and save the Pope as a lone inquisitor with a crossbow.

name: Wasps!
description: Wasps is a battle arena which puts you in the backyard of your house to fend off all the nasty wasps attacking you and your neighborhood, built for the HTC Vive and room scale VR. Get your lawn mower, chainsaw and the axe and tear them in pieces!

name: Stifled
description:
Stifled is a multi-award winning, VR and Mic-Enabled Sound-Based Survival Thriller, where sound is the only way you see and the enemies HEAR your fear.

In Stifled, the sounds made by your in-game character and yourself through microphone input reveal the otherwise hidden world through ‘echolocation’. However, undue noise will attract the attention of creatures lurking in the darkness. To survive, you will have to tread the line between making sounds to see, and staying quiet to stay hidden. (Put the microphone near your nose for even more challenge!)

name: Super Jagua
description: Super Jagua is a classic 2D retro-style single-player platformer inspired by the greatest platformers of the 80s. Run, jump, swim, discover lots of secrets, fight brutal bosses and more in this classic NES inspired adventure.

name: Crash Wheels
description: Arcade racing with the physics of damage

name: Super Hop 'N' Bop Ultra
description: Local multiplayer retro action!

name: Drive Megapolis
description:
Improve your real life driving skills! 
Drive Megapolis is designed to be interactive and also a learning opportunity. Tracking your driving mistakes and clearly highlighting them, allowing you to learn and improve. With a huge variety of vehicles with unique driving styles, maps, pedestrians and traffic.

name: Panic at Multiverse High!
description: Join up to 18 possible best friends in an insane adventure through a bizarre high school in this parody visual novel! Celebrate weird holidays! Take strange classes! Face down your rival at Prom! (Also he is a literal monster.) And there’s a mystery, I guess! Panic at Multiverse High!

name: A Duel Hand Disaster: Trackher
description: Split-screen single player twin stick risk 'em up. Your score is meaningless unless you exist. Playing till death will leave you scoreless and will also wipe your previous position from the leaderboard. Don't lose sight of your mission. Trackher.

name: The VR Museum of Fine Art
description: JUST UPDATED: Explore the Second Floor of the Museum! Explore a virtual museum in room-scale VR: see famous sculptures in full, 1:1 scale and see famous paintings without the limitations of glass and security guards. If you've ever wanted to get your grubby hands all over the priceless artifacts at your local museum, this is the VR experience for you!

name: Make America Great Again: The Trump Presidency
description:
A Pro-Donald Trump presidential simulation.  Make America Rich Again through trade.  Make America Safe again by Defeating ISIS.   
Make America Great Again!

name: Third Eye
description: Third Eye is a hack 'n' slash adventure based on Indian culture featuring rich 3D graphics, an immersive storyline, challenging level design and hordes of enemies to slay.

name: Virtual Rides 3
description:
DESIGN! CONTROL! RIDE! 
Virtual Rides III is here! Set foot in an even bigger, more colorful, and more impressive fairground than ever before! Let your imagination be your guide! Design, control, and ride more than 10 unique attractions!

name: Invention 2
description: While you were on the island exploring the underground laboratory, the infection was busy spreading throughout the world.

name: Hyper color ball
description: Hyper color ball is a casual, difficult game. The game-play mechanics are based on testing your focus and dexterity skills. With a fast paced, upbeat soundtrack and a strong vibrant colours. Hyper color ball makes for a fantastic party game.

name: Ubermosh Vol.3
description: The third volume of the arcade series Ubermosh.

name: Fancy Slingshot VR
description:
Destroy the bottle in a beautiful coffee shop. Twenty different level waiting their challenger.  
Destroy them all through the slingshot in your hand! 
All the bottle in the games can be Destroy .  
Turn around to change mode between Challenge and practice.

name: DragonBlast VR
description: Choose your dragon and defend the village against invaders in this endless flyer virtual reality game.

name: PooShooter: Toilet Invaders
description:
Pooshooter: Toilet Invaders is a 2D action comedy game packed with explosions and fun gameplay. Reminiscent of arcade classics like Space Invaders, PooShooter lets you take control of a Bum fighting against vengeful Toilets.  
 
PooShooter: Toilet Invaders offers tons of levels which increase in difficulty, where you can blast more and more Toilets while dodging their projectile Plungers. There are also bonus Golden Toilets that occasionally fly across the top of the screen for extra points.

name: Legends of Time
description: Legends of Time is a multiplayer couch hack and slash where you cooperatively work with friends to take on a world of enemies.

name: Gun Brothers
description: "Gun Brothers" is a frantic top down shooter for 1-4 players.

name: Cyberline Racing
description: Cyberline Racing combines action packed shooting with adrenaline pumped races, delivering an explosive experience. Load your car with guns and put your driving skills to the ultimate test as you dodge missiles, destroy enemy cars, and race to the top of the online rankings!

name: Fantastic 4 In A Row 2
description: Fantastic 4 In A Row 2 is a modern version of the timeless classic, played on a distant planet with beautiful graphics and music. Participating players take turns dropping colored discs from the top of the screen into a vertically suspended grid.

name: Fantastic Checkers 2
description: Fantastic Checkers 2 is a modern version of the classic strategy board game set in an extraterrestrial environment! The objective of the game is to capture opponent pieces by diagonally jumping over them to eliminate them from the board.

name: Ultimate Word Search 2: Letter Boxed
description: Ultimate Word Search 2: Letter Boxed takes you into a world of mystery where your task is to locate hidden words in a matrix of letters. Each matrix contain words that wrap around a 3D-cube going left, right, up and down.

name: Atomic Society
description: Construct and rule your own post-apocalyptic city. Judge the lives of the people under you. Set the laws people live by. Be cruel or kind and learn how to survive.

name: Unreal Heroes
description: Unreal Heroes is a game in 2D inspired by strike force heroes and built on unreal engine 4.

name: Sparky's Hunt
description: A creature called Sparky is invading your town looking for something and your house is next.  Can you fight her off before she catches you?  Try to survive the week without getting caught and solve the mystery to why she is targeting you.

name: Hate Free Heroes RPG
description: Hate Free Heroes is a modern day role playing game that takes the player into the role of an H.F.H agent and researcher dedicated to decreasing the rise of "Aggromites" in the city.

name: Beat the Dictators
description: While playing this stress relief game, you are going to become a real hitman! You will be earning diamonds and coins killing the nasty dictators, the bosses of furious armies which ended so many innocent lives. The more you torture and whack the dictators, the more coins and diamonds will you earn!

name: Pinball Parlor
description:
A concept anyone can instantly understand.
The joy of experiencing a novelty not found in any other game.
A game you will want to play again and again after only a short period of time.

name: TankYou!
description: TankYou! offers the most destructive twin-stick arena-shooting action that a game should even consider. It centers on easy-to-learn but hard-to-master mechanics and allows up to 4 players couch-coop on any game mode!

name: Resfort
description: Your story was started one autumn night. You and group of friends falls asleep in your tents, dying campfire flicks outside when night descended on forest with scary sounds. When you closed your eyes you heard terrifying loud cry that drove away dreams caused you to check out friends.

name: Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's The Masque of the Red Death - Collector's Edition
description: Justice is in your hands!

name: Hidden Expedition: Dawn of Prosperity - Collector's Edition
description: What's hiding under the dome?

name: Final Cut: Death on the Silver Screen - Collector's Edition
description: Save your brother before the final cut!

name: Mystery Case Files: 13th Skull - Collector's Edition
description: Uncover the secrets of the 13th Skull!

name: Legacy of Dorn: Herald of Oblivion
description: A vast choice-based digital gamebook set within the Warhammer 40,000 universe where you are a Space Marine!

name: Happy Empire
description: Help the princess overcome difficulties, banish the evil wizard and restore the empire!

name: Football Mogul 15
description:
Football Mogul 15 is the 12th version of the addictive football simulation game from the makers of Baseball Mogul.

This version includes rosters and player ratings for opening weekend of the 2015-2016 season. Enjoy controlling your football franchise in any year from 1970 to 2015. Lead your team to the promise land and hoist the Lombardi Trophy.

name: Beautiful Japanese Scenery: Animated Jigsaws
description: Animated Jigsaws is a jigsaw puzzle game with video instead of pictures. “Beautiful Japanese Scenery” contains moving images from Japanese famous places including Mt. Fuji, Kyoto, Tokyo, the Snow Monkeys in a natural hot spring and more!

name: 18 Wheels of Steel: Convoy
description: Take the wheel of a fast paced, high intensity trucking business. Start as a one man show, bidding on jobs, then build your fleet into an unstoppable convoy and deliver the goods. Grow your business and your fleet, but beware - your reputation is everything.

name: 18 Wheels of Steel: Haulin'
description: Life on the road is filled with obstacles. Do you have the juice to go from gearjammer to boss man in the trucking business? Climb in the can and find out!

name: Turbo Pug DX
description:
Turbo Pug is back and better than ever!
In Turbo Pug DX you'll explore a variety of beautiful, passionately crafted environments. Collect treasures, score boosters, unlock other creatures to play as. Unlock secret mini games. Create custom level skins or enjoy skins created by other players.

name: Deadlock
description: Deadlock is a virtual reality arcade shooter that pits you against waves of enemies who will stop at nothing to destroy you. Face down tactical troopers, flying drones and vicious attack dogs. It's kill or be killed, and to get the high score you'll need light feet, fast reflexes and a steady aim.

name: Arkham Nightmares
description: Arkham Nightmares is an adventure game with rogue-like elements. You play Prof. Liebwerk the head physician of the Lovecraftian Arkham Sanatorium. Your task is to complete your journal with all the stories from the crazy inmates. But before they will tell you anything you have to win their trust.

name: Luxis
description: Luxis is a game of memory, reflexes, intuition, and problem solving. Get lost in the atmospheric music and glowing world, then find your way out.

name: Friday Night Bullet Arena
description: Friday Night Bullet Arena is a top-down multiplayer shoot-a-thon with a twist: each player only gets one bullet! You can catch your own bullet to fire again, but catching other bullets is... not recommended.

name: Elena
description: Elena is an atmospheric first person exploration game in which the player discovers the story of a young couple. The player takes the role of Anna and has to find out what happened to her husband Lennard.

name: Panzer Warfare
description: Panzer Warfare - best game about tanks of all time.

name: Desperate Times
description: Use a variety of wonderful weaponry to annihilate literally thousands of enemy ships while dodging the unfathomable curtain of bullets they hurl in your direction. Defeat five epic bosses to claim your ultimate victory.

name: Galactic Fighters
description: Galactic Fighters is a 3D space shooter arcade bullet hell videogame in first and third person. Will you manage to get through hordes of aliens and bosses ready to destroy you and the whole universe? Choose your spaceship power it up: the fate of the universe is in your hands.

name: Alpha Decay
description:
First-person shooter meets basebuilding! 
Alpha Decay is a teambased Realtime Strategy Multiplayer Shooter, where your goal is to destroy the enemies base while you defend and build up your own.

name: Oh No! Bugs!
description: Oh No! Bugs! Is a casual arcade game where you squash bugs by pushing blocks. Play solo or with friends, locally or online!

name: Squeezone
description:
Squeezone - it's pretty fabulous tower defence with shoot 'em up elements. 
Prepare to protect the main tower: build structures, make sure to take a stand for yourself! In Squeezone you must directly support your protective buildings, conquer enemies as your character with complete freedom of action! Don’t forget to collect coins that falling from the mobs and upgrade defensive structures!

name: Howl
description: Howl is a turn-based tactical folktale set in a world of living ink, where the sound of a ‘howling plague’ turns people into feral beasts. Rid the lands of the plague using your crossbow, magic skills and your wits, planning every move up to six steps in advance. Some think prophecy is carved in stone – write your own in ink and blood.

name: Maximum Archery the Game
description: Maximum Archery The Game is an Ultra-Realistic first person Bow Hunting simulation. Players must master hunting equipment and the elements just like you would in a real life buck hunt. The game is targeted for users who love to experience a challenging bow hunt for monster white tail deer.

name: Scum
description: Scum aims to evolve the multiplayer open world survival game with unprecedented levels of character customization, control and progression, where knowledge and skills are the ultimate weapons for long-term survival. Combining the methodical planning and management of hardcore survival with optional PvP ‘network events’ available to everyone at anytime, SCUM strikes a unique balance between complex simulation and intense action in the next generation of survival game.

name: Joana's Life
description: In a peaceful part of the town, a series of deaths occur, seemingly random at first, but gruesome in their nature. One day, you find an object that doesn't belong in your house. An old, worn-out, stained mirror. You'll come to discover that the simple mirror isn't the only thing that is out of place.

name: Click Space Miner
description:
In Click Space Miner you take control over a mining company in space. There is a big market, a lot of customers, but therefore also a lot of concurrents so you have to mine fast.  
 
 
Gameplay:  
 
 
Click fast to get rich. Mine resources with your mouse fast and buy new tools and machines to do the work for you. Earn more and more money and get rich. But while mining and keeping track of the high management expenses, dont forget to renew your mining licenses because they are very popular and if you come too late you lose everything.

name: Armored Core 2
description:
The genuine sequel to the original Armored Core. Thrown into the world of AC mechs, you must complete the objectives set for you by a range of different companies, each with a hefty pay packet attached. If the mission is completed, the money goes towards upgrades and repairs to your mech.

The collection of items to upgrade your mech is fully stocked with weapons, defense systems, rocket packs and guidance systems to increase accuracy and speed. Certain missions require a particular upgrade for the mission to be completed correctly, so spending the cash wisely is important to your career.

Once your mech is ready for battle, you can also take on a friend in arena mode, where one-on-one battles rage on for as long as you wish in huge outdoor areas.

name: Avalon Legends Solitaire 2
description: Harness the power of the cards as you travel across Avalon through 300 meticulously crafted levels of engaging solitaire to collect the resources you need to restore the kingdom to glory.

name: Hero Boy
description: Hero Boy is a 2D horror/brawler set in the notebook of an 8 year old boy during a zombie outbreak. Fight through hordes of enemies, imaginary and real, to face your fears and protect your family!

name: 69 Ways to Kill a Zombie
description: Experience the innovative "LOCO" motion VR movement system to grind through hordes of physics-based zombies! Weapons? We give you over 60 tools to unleash Your creativity - guns, explosives, traps, swords, bows, spears! A true first peek into the future of VR movement.

name: Wave Magic VR
description: Be a mage in virtual reality. Learn and cast powerful magic spells to fight off the golems, an army of mindless creatures left behind from the battles of the past. Fight with a variety of control schemes including: Vive Wands and Leap Motion.

name: BitRay2
description: BitRay 2 -  is a simple puzzle game in which your task is to destroy all the black cubes, and do so all the white appeared on the white platform.

name: Drunk on Nectar
description: Drunk On Nectar is a Nature Sandbox game about animals, plants and ecology. Finally, a game where you can Play as Creatures, Simulate ecosystems of your own or participate in Creature Quest leaderboards. Frequently updated with new content.

name: The Pirate: Caribbean Hunt
description:
Hail to the Captain!
Sail into the heart of the Caribbean in the Age of Piracy - the time of black flags and white skulls, blue waves and golden opportunities.
Hoist the Jolly Roger and grab the steering wheel to sail through battles and raids, ransoms and treasures, to become the Crimson King of the Antilles!

name: Zombie Estate 2
description: One of the highest rated Xbox Indie Games is now available for PC! How long can you survive in this online co-op wave based shooter? Featuring 35 characters, over 100 weapons, 30 stat-boosting hats, and 6 levels, Zombie Estate 2 is a frantically fun experience to share with friends!

name: Cursed West
description: Cursed West contains the spirit of Glories of the past, Holding aspects such as Difficulty and Mechanics. Adding more modern visuals in both, levels with traditional 2d gameplay, as in the 3d levels

name: HoCWar
description: Immerse yorself into the harsh world of ruthless card battles!

name: Gochi-Show!
description: Japanese Cooking Everywhere.

name: Gochi-Show! for Girls
description: Japanese Cooking Everywhere.

name: Final Quest
description: A time of change is coming. One small boy, the last of a long line of Gem Warriors, will soon discover the true power of his heritage. In so doing, he will embark upon a Final quest to free the people and to find his long lost father.

name: Duckles: the Jigsaw Witch
description: Lured by a vengeful spirit of a defeated witch, Duckles, and his friends, find themselves trapped on a mysterious island full of deadly sorceresses! What heinous plans does this gruesome Witch have for him? And what is the true origin of the island?

name: Flat Path
description: Relaxing puzzle game in a minimal style.

name: One Giant Leap
description: In One Giant Leap you are equipped with a pair of booster jets for controllers! Fly across the moon, navigating courses to plant the flag and destroy  asteroids with rockets along the way.

name: Iactura
description:
It is your job to save the planet from its decay. Only you can prevent an extraterrestrial species from taking over all of humankind.
How? By shooting them back to where they belong - into the depths of hell of course!

name: Zombie Trigger
description: Zombie Trigger is a VR first person shooting game where you play as an agent in a Japanese Temple to escape the siege of zombies. The game provide 10 levels, 2 game modes and 2 bosses.

name: Kuboom
description: Choose a character and customize it. Get a firearm and show the enemies, who’s the boss of the battlefield. In this multiplayer game, you can find almost any weapon: pistol, shotgun, machine gun, or a sniper rifle. Choosing the weapon, pay attention to its stats: each piece varies by damage and accuracy. Get the weapon that suits you best. All weapons in the game can be customized and upgraded: change the barrel to improve the shooting ability, add a trinket or set a scope to shoot like a true sniper. You can also choose among the common, rare, legendary and exotic weapon skins one that will reflect your personality. If it comes to a close combat, use a knife. The game has any kind of blades: from a butterfly knife to a machete. And for those who want to surprise their enemy in a short fight, there is an axe or even a shovel.

name: Outrageous Grounds: The Maze
description: Outrageous Grounds: The Maze is an original virtual reality action adventure. You will explore the depths of The Maze, battle your way through enemies, unravel mysteries, solve puzzles and to experience something new in VR gaming.

name: Occhio
description:
Occhio is a fast-paced puzzle platformer about facing fears, inside a lucid dream.

Explore this massive world, conquer obstacles, fight epic bosses to discover the truth behind this strange dream.

name: Escape from Zellman Orbital
description: Escape the Room - in outer space!  From a lab cell on an orbital space station, make your way back to your ship, and get out... before something terrible happens!  Story-Heavy escape-the-room style gameplay, in a sci-fi horror setting.

name: The Tower: Last Stand
description: You are alone in a medieval tower that you must defend against a large onslaught of demonic enemies. Inspired by the, "Tower," Tarot Card, and the Graphic Novel series, "Heavy Metal," enjoy your attempts to stay alive in this great HTC Vive game.

name: Rescue Bear Operation
description: Rescue Bear Operation is: a one-level, all ages, child friendly, free to play, mini game designed to create awareness about wildfires. We'll be donating at least 30% of our net proceeds to charitable causes.

name: Max, an Autistic Journey
description: Max, an Autistic Journey is a retro style top-down turn-based RPG filled with mini games, monsters and most of all, heart. Developed by a devoted dad who made a game with his son about his son's autism.

name: Marwin and the Evolution Stone
description: Is evolution reversible? In fact, it is where the problem arises in the "Marwin and the Evolution Stone" universe. The whale buddy helps to an ex-human who was devolved into a primate because of the evil wizard. But, a big trouble awaits them.

name: Duck Force
description: Experience an amazing adventure in the rough stone age, where the bunny people under rule of a maniacal leader strives for the absolute power. Fly through dry deserts and rocky canyons full of challenges and evolve from a lame duck to a majestic flight artists.

name: Ship It
description: Fast-paced block stacking VR fun in a playful factory setting. Pack a box with colorful shapes, then ship it to earn your wage. Filling VR boxes is physically satisfying as you grab blocks, rotate them with you hands, and smash them home.

name: Airborne Empires
description: Tabletop war gaming has come to life as a fully immersive VR experience! As the supreme leader of your own miniature army, you must use all your wits and cunning to outsmart your opponent on the battlefield.

name: Showdown Adventure
description: Take part in awesome, funny adventure on unfriendly, dangerous island! Defeat monsters, discover big world and collect unique items.

name: Retro Football Boss
description: Retro Football Boss is a historical football management simulation featuring the English professional leagues from 1888 to 1998 (with German leagues coming soon). This is your chance to take a trip down memory lane or right the wrongs of the past.

name: Onraid
description: Onraid is a challenging 2D shooter game, where you are free to develop your own play style and tactics to destroy your enemies.

name: Chexs
description: Chexs is an evolution of chess, a new take on the old classic. It is a strategy game played on a hexagonal board where both sides move all of its pieces within a single turn, then all movements are solved simultaneusly.

name: VR Ultimate Paintball: Heartbreak, Regret & Paintbots
description: VR Ultimate Paintball: Heartbreak, Regret & Paintbots focuses on an arcade style of gameplay. Containing four different game modes: wave based shooter, competitive target practice, challenging stage based trial map and an episodic story.

name: Reproduction Man
description: Reproduction Man is a 2D puzzler where you help some very simple-minded sperm get to the egg. This cult classic of the Windows shareware era was brought back for its 20th anniversary with all-new graphics, animation and sound. Its outward cuteness belies some very tough puzzles.

name: Gravity Shot
description: Sling shot explosive nuclear warheads into collision course with your planetary assassination targets. Using the gravitation of a planet against itself, while navigating your payload around asteroids, moons and even Black Holes for devastating effect!

name: Kite
description: Regain control of the secret weapons base Arch City and try to rescue the scientists trapped inside. Equip your H.O.R.D. droid with retro-future technology reclaimed from battle and become the ultimate soldier. Blast through a lush, destructible pixel-art world and strive for the highest rank on each stage.

name: Box Maze
description: Jump into the life of Cubert, and help him reach his true love as you find your way through unique levels without being destroyed by your enemies as well as other obstacles, encounter new enemies and bosses as you climb the levels, collect cupcakes for your love along the way as you find hidden secrets.

name: Fancy Skiing VR
description:
Fancy Skiing is developed by HashVR Studio built with the Unity Engine.The game's structure is based on real skiing that players use the handles just as ski poles to get power and lean left or right to control the direction, which brings players a strong immersion. Furthermore, we add a lot of fancy elements, like leaping grand canyons and hunting deer. While  
skiing, players try their best to avoid obstacles including dynamic ones to ski as far as they can and speed also plays an import role in your final score. 
You can sit down to play the game if you feel a bit sick.

name: Tank Defense Division
description: Tank Defense Division is an arcade-like strategy game. In which players battle foreign tanks to test their own mettle. The game coming with both a single player campaign and coop. Along with a diverse selection of Levels, Enemies, and Game modes to Explore, Battle, Build upon, and Share.

name: Cosmos Crash VR
description: The first person shooting & puzzle VR game.

name: Nakiti Generations
description: 2D action adventure game set in the far future on a mysterious abandoned planet with yourself as the only survivor.

name: Swordlord
description: Swing the sharp end of your pixelated weapon into your enemies! Use momentum, your body and your wits to slay your enemies!

name: Nightshade
description: A romance visual novel game made in collaboration with D3P and Red Entertainment.Character design and illustrations are by the popular illustrator Teita. The romance revolves around Ninjas who have lived through the Sengoku Period.

name: Metal Carnage
description: Metal Carnage is a car-based online session shooter... With turrets!

name: Trickster VR
description: A procedurally generated fantasy adventure, starring floating islands, magic artefacts to loot and a horde of orcs! Try your skills against orcish combat expertise, ancient magic and ragtag airships!

name: Duckpocalypse
description: In the future, intelligent robot ducks have become smarter than humans, they took our jobs, and took control of our world! You can't cope with being second in the food chain, so this is how your duck hunt starts.

name: Birdtual Reality
description: Welcome to Birdtual Reality, the first open-world flying and air-racing game for the HTC Vive.  If you have ever dreamed of flying like a bird or super-hero, this is the VR experience for you!

name: Rogue Stache
description: Rogue Stache is an action-adventure platforming roguelike which draws heavy inspiration from hits such as Rogue Legacy, Risk of Rain, and Magicite. Explore vast interstellar dungeons and defeat hordes of cunning enemies!

name: Green Moon 2
description: This is a pure adventure game with tons of tasks to complete. There are around 400 locations in the game, 48 hours of gameplay, plus many unique mini-games, such as piloting a spaceship, shooting a bow in the Middle Ages, and fighting duels in the Wild West.

name: Lockdown: Stand Alone
description: Step inside one of the most atmospheric and challenging VR games to date. Free movement, refined gun mechanics and large city scenes - no wave shooting.

name: Schacht
description: Schacht is a fast-paced 3D platformer focused on speedrunning and competition. Run on walls, swing, slide and dash to beat the levels as fast as possible. Compare your best times with your friends and with players from all around the world.

name: Aviators
description: Aviators is a chaotic and highly competitive online party game played in teams with up to 4 players a side. Work together to secure victory for your team by any means necessary, even if it means sacrificing yourself like a true kamikaze Aviator.

name: BitMaster
description: BitMaster is a dynamic and colorful twin-stick shooter which design was inspired by such games as Geometry Wars, Crimson Land and Satellite Reign. Game powered by Unreal Engine 4!

name: Satellite Command
description: Satellite Command is a realistic astrophysics simulator. Complete contracts with real data, launch and take control of ever more powerful Satellites, research advanced technology and build your Space Agency!

name: Through Abandoned 2: The Forest
description:
You continue your journey in worlds of Abandoned. Welcome to the Forest, the sacral place in the Ordered.

Solve puzzles, find items and a way to use them. Try to reach your brother and have fun.

name: Mu Cartographer
description:
Mu Cartographer is a contemplative game experience that combines colourful sandbox and experimental treasure hunt. 
 
Learn to operate an abstract machine in order to shape and explore colourful landscapes and find the mysteries hidden in a shifting world.

name: Blade & Bones
description: A Combat driven metroidvania experience. Discover a tale long lost in our past. Seven swords need to be found in this world where you will discover ancient secrets and fight with an intense combat system that rewards players for their skills and knowledge.

name: VR Escape the space station
description:
You are trapped in the space station all by yourself. Need to find a way to get the hell out of there.
Experience with HTC Vive, consists of 4 rooms full of puzzles.
Every scene are elaborately designed including spaceship with zero gravity, outer space landscape corridor and all.

name: Path of War
description: Design your mobile headquarters, raise a fearsome army and wreak a path of destruction across the United States in 1-to-1 scale! Wage war to expand your territory through fast-paced, intense player-vs-player combat and upgrade your base with the enemy’s loot. Forge cooperative alliances and together expand the ever-growing borders of your new empire!

name: Agenda
description: Agenda is a strategy simulation game in which you control a world-wide independent agency with a set goal of world domination. Try to claim your global influence through the power of your allies and covert operations such as assassinations, bribery or fraud.

name: Geo
description:
Geo is a game about building and expanding an intergalactic mining corporation. 
Explore uncharted space and discover comets, moons, Planets and gas giants before heading in and drilling the cash out of them! Expand your HQ, build new rooms and facilities to increase your drilling stats. Hire unique crew members to aid you in becoming the biggest and best intergalactic mining corporation in the cosmos. Collect hundreds of weird and wonderful items all used to research new facilities and crew members. Discover giant frozen planets, acid filled metallic moons, scorching sandy comets and more, all in the name of profits.

name: Intralism
description: Intralism - fast and hard arcade. Listen to music and match all notes. Master all the maps or create your own and challenge friends in the online multiplayer. But remember: wrong button - failed try.

name: Anykey Simulator
description:
Anykey Simulator allows you to feel the hardship of computer designing. 
In this game you are faced with solving simple puzzles - you have to move available computer module to appointed place in the field of 5x5 squares, in the way that modules won't suffer, preferably all of them, but your aim is to complete the plan.

name: Deadly Metal
description: Meet our main character. Here is Walter Black, the leader of the Stillborn Sky group performing music in metal style. Also, you must know that Walter Black hates all people on the Earth. The system and society is annoying him. Somewhere deep down, Walter always knew that one day, he can't longer suppress his manic propensity.

name: Vive le Roi
description: January 21, 1793, Revolutionaries are about to guillotine King Louis XVI of France. Can you save him and change history?

name: Miaou Moon
description: Rise to the challenge and play Captain Miaou, lost in space. Survive by grabbing energy food to propel yourself and gain enough speed momentum. Fight gravity and bump away through 5 worlds of various physical obstacles. Time your jumps accordingly, upgrade your catsuit and scratch at will !

name: So Many Cubes
description:
A chaotic strategy game with cubes!

You have to choose and build deployments to destroy the Mothercube with So Many Cubes

name: Energy Invasion
description: Energy Invasion - an arcade game inspired by the classic Breakout. Unlike the original game, your ball does not break blocks on its own, but can launch missiles in a chosen direction.

name: Madrobot X
description: MadRobot X is an old school shoot 'em up game. You control a robot trying to escape from the laboratory of a mad scientist, and to accomplish this, you'll need the help of GoboGobo, another robot who also wants to escape.

name: SkyTime
description: SkyTime is a 3D platformer in which you slow time, dodge bullets, destroy turrets and overcome obstacles! If you ever played Superhot or Cluster Truck, this game combines them both!

name: Mythic Victory Arena
description:
★ Welcome to Mythic Victory Arena! ★ 
 
Select a character and face off in the arena. Climb your way through the ranks to become the champion and achieve your greatest desire. The arena is here for you to show off your best ability. What are you waiting for?

name: Factory Engineer
description:
Factory Engineer is a factory simulation game which is about creating a huge automated factory by building production lines to create products and make money.
Start with simple products,make money,unlock technologies then create the most sophisticated products.

name: Orbital X
description: An epic journey through the endless space!
